text:
Freimut Duve (26 November 1936 – 3 March 2020) was a German politician and writer. He was born in Würzburg. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). He served as a member of the national Bundestag from 1980 to 1990. He was also the OSCE Representative on Freedom of the Media from 1998 to 2004.
Duve died in Hamburg on 3 March 2020. He was 83.

annotations.surface_form: OSCE Representative on Freedom of the Media
